content: X-UCT MX Cable tie mount Plastic universal cable/conduit tie holder for use with BX and GX nailers ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time-saving, more reliable and versatile fastener for electric cables Friction-fit in the nose of BX/GX nailers for easy handling Can be preassembled prior to fastening Cable ties can be inserted in two main directions Can hold multiple cable ties Applications Fastening electrical cables Fastening flexible and rigid electrical conduits Fastening data cables with a VelcroÂ® system ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduits, Electrical applications, Bunched cables, Single cables, Mechanical and electrical fixtures, Light-duty pipes Material: High-density polyethylene (HDPE), Halogen-free, Silicone-free For use with (tools): BX 3-ME-22, BX 3-ME-A22, GX 120-ME, GX 3-ME Technical Data | Application | Cable Fastenings, Conduit Fastening | Material | High-density polyethylene (HDPE), Halogen-free, Silicone-free | For use with (tools) | BX 3, GX 120, GX 3 | Base materials | Concrete (soft), Concrete (tough), Masonry (solid limestone brick), Steel | Approvals | N/A | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2095183 - Universal cable tie holder X-UCT MX - Package Size 100 pc
